'''Ghita''' is a character in the [[Season 5|fifth]] season. She will be played by [[Hattie Gotobed]].<ref>[http://www.watchersonthewall.com/young-cersei-cast/]</ref><ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/season-five-casting-news-updates/]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels there is no mention of a character named Ghita.
